name: Space Rangers 2: Reboot
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup.exe file
game:
  exe: "drive_c/Program Files (x86)/1C/\u041A\u043E\u0441\u043C\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\
    \u043A\u0438\u0435 \u0420\u0435\u0439\u043D\u0434\u0436\u0435\u0440\u044B 2/Rangers.exe"
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vb6run
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    description: Install to default location
    executable: $installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
